songs.title: One More Yesterday
songs.album: A Collection of Rare and Unreleased Recordings
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Kelly Clarkson with Daughtry]
Looking back at what we had
Before the bridges burned
The plans we made, of give and take
So little in return
If nothing else, we lost ourselves
Somewhere along the way
What I'd give for one more yesterday

[Chorus: Kelly Clarkson & Daughtry]
I was never gonna let you down
Give you solid ground when your world was shaking
How could it come to this?
I was tryna fix, but we ended up breaking
I remember when we falled and laid to rest
And promises, they wash away
What I'd give for one more yesterday

[Verse 2: Daughtry with Kelly Clarkson]
Memories, the used-to-be's
Are complicated things
The woulda-been's, the coulda-been;s
Are suffocating me
Now you got what I'm choking on
The words that always came out wrong
What I'd give for one more yesterday

[Chorus: Kelly Clarkson & Daughtry]
I was never gonna let you down
Give you solid ground when your world was shaking
How could it come to this?
I was tryna fix, but we ended up breaking
I remember when we fall and laid to rest
And promises, they wash away
What I'd give for one more yesterday

[Bridge: Kelly Clarkson & Daughtry]
I know we both said
Moving on is only for the better
I know we both left
But how we could've belonged together
Saying it doesn't make it so
Shoulda never let us go

[Chorus: Kelly Clarkson & Daughtry]
I was never gonna let you down
Give you solid ground when your world was shaking
How could it come to this?
I was tryna fix, so we ended up breaking
I remember when we fall and laid to rest
And promises, they wash away
What I'd give for one more yesterday
What I'd give for one more yesterday
What I'd give for one more yesterday
Yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah
